definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: go up, ascend, climb (NH id.; MI:33(?); Ph. [[עלה]]; As. elû; Ar. 9ala0; Targum and Syr. in der. species; cf. perh. Eth. la9ala: (for l9a9ala: 9al9ala:Di:54); Sab. [[עלי]] = 9al=ay DHM:ZMG xxxvii. 415, cf. [[עלוהו]] = 9ulwahu Sab Denkm:91);—
of persons, go up, ascend, in local relations:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: from low place to high, c. [[מִן]], [[מִמִּחְרַיִם]] Ge 45:25 (E) + 6 t.; [[מארץ מחרים]] Ex 13:18 (E) + 3 t.; † [[מִבָּבֶל]] Ezr 7:6, Ezr 8:1; [[מִן הירדן]] Jos 4:16, Jos 4:17, Jos 4:19 (P); [[מדבר]]([[ן־ה]])[[מ]] Ct So 3:6, So 8:5 etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. acc. of place whither: a city [[ביתאל]] Ge 35:1, Ge 35:3 (E); [[באר שׁבע]] Ge 26:23 (J); a mountain [[ההר]] Nu 13:17 (JE) De 1:24 +, etc.; a bed Ge 49:4, Ge 49:4 (J) 2Ki 1:4, 2Ki 1:16, gate Ru 4:1; [[שָּׁמַיִם]]([[הַ]]) De 30:12, 2Ki 2:11, Am 9:2 + 4 t.; c. [[אֶל־]], [[הר]]([[ה]])[[אל ]] Ex 19:23, Ex 34:2, Ex 34:4 (J) Ex 24:15, Ex 24:18 (P) + 5 t. P; [[אֶל־הַמָּקוֹם]] De 17:8, [[אל ירושׁלם]] Ezr 7:7, Is 2:3 = Mic 4:2 ([[אל הר]]), c. acc. loc. + ´[[אֶל־י]] (v.

definitions.title: 2 b
definitions.body: ) Je 31:6, of going up to Jerusalem (from a distance), etc.; c. [[לְ]] to, [[לירושׁלם]] Ezr 1:3 (from Babylon); [[לבית]] 1Sa 25:35, etc.; c. [[עַד]] unto, [[עד־נחל]] Nu 32:9 (J); †c. [[בְּ]], [[בְּאַחַת עָרֵי]] 2Sa 2:1 (constr. praegn.); [[בְּבעל]] [[פרחים]] 1Ch 14:11 (del. [[בְּ]]); [[בְּגִרָלִי]] Ju Jdg 1:3.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: to sacred places, Ex 34:24, c. acc. † [[בית יהוה]], from palace 2Ki 19:14, 2Ki 20:5, 2Ki 20:8, 2Ki 23:2, 2Ch 29:20, 2Ch 34:30, Is 37:14, Is 38:22, Je 26:10; [[במה]] 1Sa 9:13, 1Sa 9:14, 1Sa 9:19; c. [[אֶל]], [[אל הר האלהים]] Ex 24:13 (E); ´[[בּבית י]] 1Sa 1:7 ([[בּ]] dittogr.); [[בהר יהוה]] Ps 24:3.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: c. acc. [[דֶּרֶח]] by the way to † Nu 21:33 (E) De 3:1, Ju Jdg 8:11, 1Sa 6:9, 2Ki 3:8; [[מעלה]] Je 48:5; [[חוֹמָה]] Joe 2:7.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: ascend, climb, c. [[בְּ]] by, a ladder Ge 28:12 (E), Ez Eze 40:6, Eze 40:22, Eze 40:29, etc.; c. [[עַל]] upon, altar by ([[ב]]) steps, of priest, Ex 20:23 (Gi; van d. H. v:26; E) the roof Jos 2:8, Ju Jdg 9:51, bed Ps 132:3; [[עַל־יׇדָיו]] on his hands 1Sa 14:13; [[על במתי עב]] Is 14:14 (‖[[ממעל לכוכבי אֵל]]), etc.
go up, in personal relations:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: to meet  or visit, c. [[אֶל]] pers., Ge 44:17, Ge 44:24, Ge 44:34, Ge 45:9 (J) Jos 10:4, Jos 10:6 (all with implication of ascent), De 25:7 (to gate of city), +; c. † [[על]] pers., Ge 38:12 (= [[ה]] loc., up to Timnah); [[לקראת]] Ge 46:29 (J) Ju Jdg 6:35, 2Ki 1:3, 2Ki 1:6, 2Ki 1:7. †

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: go up unto ([[אֶל]]) God, on a height, [[אל האלהים]] Ex 19:3 (E) 1Sa 10:3; [[אל יהוה]] Ex 24:1 (E) Ex 19:24, Ex 32:30 (J) Ju Jdg 21:5, Jdg 21:5, Jdg 21:8 (to war); [[אֵלַי]] Ex 24:12 (E) De 10:1; unto Deborah Ju Jdg 4:5.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: go up after, c. [[אחרי]] = follow 1Sa 25:13, 1Ki 1:35, 1Ki 1:40.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: go up, depart, c. [[מֵעַל]] (q.v.) 1Sa 6:20, Ge 17:22, Ge 35:18 (P) +, subj. ´[[כבוד י]] Ez Eze 11:23, Eze 11:24; = withdraw, retreat, 1Ki 15:19, 2Ki 12:19, Je 21:2, abs. 2Sa 23:9, and so read ‖ 1Ch 11:13 (v. Dr:Sm). †

of animals, go or come up: abs. frogs Ex 7:28 (J) Ex 8:2 (P), quails Ex 16:13 (P); lion Is 35:9; fox Ne 3:25; rise up, fly up, eagle Is 40:31, Je 49:22; c. [[מִן]], cattle out of water Ge 41:2, Ge 41:3, Ge 41:18, Ge 41:19, Ct So 4:2, So 6:6, lion [[מִגְּאוֹן הַיַּרְדֵּן]] Je 49:19 = Je 50:44, [[מִסֻּבְּכוֹ]] Je 4:7, from prey Ge 49:9 (J); climb up into ([[ב]]) houses, locusts Joe 2:9; frogs, on ([[ב]]) persons Ex 7:29 (J); c. [[על]], of cattle, sexually Ge 31:10, Ge 31:12 (E); locusts upon the land Ex 10:12, Ex 10:14 (E) Joe 1:6. †

of vegetation, spring up, grow, shoot forth: trees Is 55:13, Is 55:13, Ez Eze 47:12; [[קיקיון]] Jon 4:6; grass De 29:22, Am 7:1; ears of grain Ge 41:5, Ge 41:22 (E), also Ge 40:10 (E) Is 5:6, Is 32:13 cf. sim. Is 53:2, Ho 10:8, Pr 26:9; [[כֻלּוֹ]] ´[[ע]] [[קמשׂנים]] Pr 24:31 all of it grown up with thorns, Is 34:13; fig. [[קֶרֶן]] Da 8:3, Da 8:8.

of natural phoenom., go up, rise: dew, Ex 16:14, i.e. disappear (P); ´[[אֵד ע]] [[מִן־הָאָרֶץ]] Ge 2:6 (J), cloud 1Ki 18:44, Je 4:13; [[הַשַּׁחַר]] ´[[ע]] dawn, etc. Ge 19:15 (JE) Ju Jdg 19:25, 1Sa 9:26 +; smoke Ge 19:28, Ex 19:18 (J) Ju Jdg 20:40 +; fire Jdg 6:21; flame Jdg 13:20; stench Is 34:3, Joe 2:20; incense Ez Eze 8:11; well Nu 21:17 (E); waters Je 47:2; Nile Je 46:7, Je 46:8, Am 8:8, Am 9:5; c. [[על]], of overflow Is 8:7 +. †

of inanimate things (instead of passive construction), abs., shock of grain (to [[גּׁרֶן]]) Job 5:26; of [[בָּשָׂר]] (covering bones in Ezek.'s vision) Ez Eze 37:8; c. [[על]], of garments upon the body Le 19:19 (P) Ez Eze 44:17; razor on head Ju Jdg 13:5, Jdg 16:17, 1Sa 1:11; yoke upon oxen Nu 19:2 (P) 1Sa 6:7; lot upon an animal Le 16:9, Le 16:10 (P); c. [[בְּ]], weight in balance Ps 62:10; entry in ([[ב]]) a book 1Ch 27:24; = be offered (of sacrif.) 1Ki 18:29, 2Ki 3:20, Is 60:7; [[אֲרוּכָה]] (q.v.) in healing, Je 8:22, fig. 2Ch 24:13 Ne 4:1.
come up before God, arrogance, [[בְּאָזְנׇיו]] 2Ki 19:18 = Is 37:29; cry, ´[[אֶל־א]] Ex 2:23 (P), c. acc. 1Sa 5:12, abs. Je 14:2; tumult Ps 74:23; of evil Jon 1:2 ([[לְפָנַי]]). †

go up, extend, of boundary, c. [[מִן]] whence, + acc., [[אֶל]], [[לְ]] and even [[בְ]] whither Jos 15:3, Jos 15:6, Jos 15:8, Jos 18:12, Jos 18:12 + (all P). † 10. excel: thou excellest ([[עַל]]) them Pr 31:29; be superior to [[יעלה עליך מעלה מעלה]] De 28:43.—[[עוֹלֶה]] Job 36:33 is difficult, cf. Comm., and v. [[עַוְלָה]]).

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 ms. [[נַעֲלָה]] Nu 10:11 +; 2 ms. [[נַעֲלֵיתָ]] Ps 97:9; Impf. [[יֵעָלֶה]] Ex 40:37, etc.; Inf. cstr. [[הֵעָלוֹת]] Nu 9:17 +, etc.; Imv. mpl. [[הֵעָלוּ]] Nu 16:24; —

definitions.title: 1. a.
definitions.body: be brought up: [[מבבל לירושׁלם]] Ezr 1:11.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: be taken up, [[וַתֵּעֲלוּ על שׂפת לשׁון]] Ez Eze 36:3 (Kö:i. 553; talked about).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: (1) pass., be taken up, away, of (pillar of) cloud, sq. [[מֵעַל]] of tabern. Ex 40:36, Nu 9:17, Nu 10:11 (P); abs. Ex 40:37, Ex 40:37, Nu 9:21, Nu 9:21, Nu 9:22 (P); of the glory from upon the cherubim Ez Eze 9:3; (2) reflex., take oneself away from, get up from: [[מִסָּבִיבׂ]] Nu 16:24; [[מֵעַל]] v:Nu 16:27; of a besieging army Je 37:5, Je 37:11.
reflex.: take oneself away [[מאחרי]] pers., from following after, 2Sa 2:27.
be exalted, of God Ps 47:10; c. [[על]], over all gods Ps 97:9.
bring up persons:

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: from a place, c. [[מִן]]:[[מִן ]] [[הַסָָּלַע]] Ju Jdg 15:13; [[מִמִּחְרַיִם]] Ex 17:3 (E) + 3 t. E, + 8 t.; [[מארץ מחרים]] Ex 32:1 (J) + 5 t. J, + Le 11:45 (P), De 20:1, Jos 24:17 (E), + 13 t.; [[מארץ חפון]] Je 16:15 = Je 23:8.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: (1) out of a place, c. [[מן]]: † [[בּוֹר]]([[ן הַ]])[[מִ]] Ge 37:28 (E) Ps 40:3, Je 38:10, Je 38:13; [[משּׁחת]] Jon 2:7; [[מקּברות]] Ez Eze 37:12, Eze 37:13; [[מן־שׁאול]] Ps 30:4, etc.; (2) c. [[בְּ]] by means of, [[בְּחֶרְמִי]] Ez Eze 32:3 (Hb Hab 1:15 v.
infr.).

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: c. acc. of place whither, Nu 20:25 (P) Nu 22:41 (E) Jos 2:6, Jos 7:24 (J) Ezr 4:2; [[השׁמים]] 2Ki 2:1; c. [[אֶל]]:[[אֶל־הָעֲלִיׇּה ]] 1Ki 17:19; c. [[לְ]]:[[לבית ]] 2Ch 8:11.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: cause to ascend, climb: [[על המרכבה]] 1Ki 20:33 ([[אֶל]] 2Ki 10:15 prob. error), [[על־המגדלות]] 2Ch 32:5 (Vulgate built towers thereon, i.e. [[עָלָיו]] ´[[ע]]); [[מֵעַל להומה]] Ne 12:31 vid. [[על]]
in personal relations:

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: in war, c. [[עַל]] against 2Ch 36:17, Je 50:9, Ez Eze 16:40, Eze 23:46, Eze 26:3.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: take away (from life) Ps 102:25, Job 36:20. †

bring up animals, c. [[על]], frogs [[על הארץ]] Ex 8:1, Ex 8:3 (P); bring up horses to a charge Je 51:27, cf. Na 3:3; draw up men, under fig. of fish ([[בְּחַכָּה]]) Hb Hab 1:15; train, young lion Ez Eze 19:3; of cattle, [[מעלה גֵרָה]], i.e. chewing the cud Le 11:3, Le 11:4, Le 11:4, Le 11:5, Le 11:6, Le 11:26, De 14:6, De 14:7, De 14:7.

cause to ascend: c. acc. rei, smoke [[מן העיר]] Ju Jdg 20:38; stench [[באף]] Am 4:10, etc.; bring waters upon, [[על]] Is 8:7; bring up from ([[מן]] loc.) 2Sa 6:2, 2Sa 6:12, 1Ki 8:1, Ge 50:25 (JE), +; c. [[אֶל]] loc., Ju Jdg 16:3, 1Ch 15:3, 1Ch 15:12, c. acc. loc. 2Ch 2:15; c. [[אל]] pers. 1Sa 6:21; c. [[לְ]] pers. Ju Jdg 16:8, 1Sa 2:19; c. [[על]], bring sickness upon De 28:61; † [[עפר על ראשׁ]] ´[[הע]] throw dust on the head Jos 7:6, La 2:10, Ez Eze 27:30; clothe sackcloth upon Am 8:10; flesh upon Ez Eze 37:6; put ornaments on 2Sa 1:24; cf. also 1Ki 10:16, 1Ki 10:17 = 2Ch 9:15, 2Ch 9:16, 2Ch 3:5, 2Ch 3:14; [[נֵר]] ´[[הע]] light lamp (make flame go up; Thes al. of raising lamp upon the lamp-stand) Ex 25:37, Ex 27:20 + 6 t. P; bring up new flesh (heal; v. [[אֲרוּכָה]]) Je 30:17, Je 33:6. †
mentally: [[גִּלּוּלִים על לב]] ´[[הע]] Ez Eze 14:3, [[אל לב]] v:Eze 14:7, i.e. make object of thought; rouse, stir up, c. acc. [[אַף]], anger Pr 15:1, cf. Ez Eze 24:8. †
´[[מנחה ל]] ´[[הע]] 2Ki 17:4 offer a present; bring up tithe to ([[ל]]) Ne 10:39; [[מַס]] ´[[הע]] raise a levy 1Ki 5:27, 1Ki 9:15, [[למס]] v:1Ki 9:21, 2Ch 8:8. †
exalt: Ps 137:6 if I exalt not Jerus. above ([[עַל]]) my chief joy; [[עלה]]([[מ]])[[אנכי אַעַלְ ְגם־]] Ge 46:4 (E) I will exalt thee exceedingly (cf.

definitions.title: Qal 10
definitions.body: ; [[מ]] lost in MT, after [[ם]]; Di and most bring up).

cause to ascend (in flame; Thes al. to go up on altar), offer sacrifice, usu. [[עׂלָה]], either alone or foll. by other sacrif.: [[העלה עלות]] Ex 24:5 (E) Ex 32:6 (J) Le 17:8 (H) De 12:13, De 12:14 + (see [[עׂלָה]]); seldom: † [[קטרת]] Ex 30:9 (P), cf. Ps 66:15; † [[מנחה]] Is 57:6, Is 66:3, also prob. 1Ki 18:29, 1Ki 18:36, 2Ki 3:20 ( >
be carried away, 3 fs. [[הׂעֲלָָתָךְ]] Na 2:8.
be taken up into, inserted in, 3 ms. [[הׂעֲלָה]] 2Ch 20:34 ([[על ספר]]) (pass. of
3 ms. be offered, of [[פר]] Ju Jdg 6:28 ([[על המזבח]]).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: lift oneself: Impf. 3 ms. [[אֶל־יִתְעַל]] Je 51:3 against (him that) lifts himself, but corrupt; either rd. [[אַל־]], let him not, etc. (SyrVer Targum Vulgate Hi Gf Gie Rothst), or del. [[אל]] (LXX Co:Hpt.).
